content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Mister Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, and I need to find a place that fits my budget. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects both the quality of the apartment and my financial situation as a student. What is the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best living space for my tenants. However, I also need to ensure that I receive a fair price for my property. The lowest price I would consider for this apartment is €1,000 per month. This includes all utilities except for electricity and internet, which the tenant would need to arrange separately. Do you believe this is a fair price for the apartment, considering its location and amenities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive with its central location and amenities. However, as a student, I must be mindful of my expenses. €1,000 per month is a significant amount for me to pay. I would appreciate if we could negotiate a lower price that would make this apartment more affordable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Mister Wang. As a landlord, I am willing to negotiate to find a price that is fair for both parties. Would €950 per month be more within your budget? This is already a reduced rate, considering the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. €950 per month is more aligned with what I am able to afford. However, I would still like to discuss if there is any further room for reduction, as every euro counts for a student like me. Could we perhaps negotiate a bit further?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I am always open to fair negotiations. However, I must also maintain a sustainable rent for my property. If you are able to pay a security deposit equivalent to one month's rent, I would be willing to reduce the monthly rent to €900. This is a very competitive rate for the area and reflects my commitment to finding a long-term tenant who values the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of €900 per month with a security deposit is very generous and shows that you are a fair and reasonable landlord. I am impressed with your commitment to finding the right tenant. I believe this is a fair price for the apartment, and I am willing to accept it. I agree to the price of €900 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mister Wang. Your acceptance of €900 per month with a security deposit demonstrates that we have reached a fair agreement. I look forward to having you as a tenant in my apartment. Please let me know if there are any other terms or conditions we need to discuss.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm also pleased with our agreement. The apartment's quality and location are well worth the €900 per month. I don't have any additional terms or conditions to discuss. I'm ready to sign the lease if you are.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent, Mister Wang. I am also ready to proceed with the lease. Once you have provided me with the security deposit and the first month's rent, we can finalize the paperwork. I'm sure you'll be very happy living in my apartment. Thank you for choosing my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt, for offering such a great apartment at a fair price. I'm looking forward to living there and being a good tenant. Let's proceed with the lease and the necessary paperwork.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Mister Wang. I'm sure you'll be an excellent tenant. I will prepare the lease agreement and all necessary documents. Please let me know when it is convenient for you to come and sign them, along with providing the security deposit and first month's rent. Once again, thank you for choosing my property. I'm excited to have you as a tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll contact you soon to arrange a time to sign the lease and provide the security deposit and first month's rent. I'm looking forward to moving in and making your apartment my new home. Thank you for your hospitality and for reaching a fair agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mister Wang. I'm glad we were able to come to a fair agreement that satisfies both parties. I'll be waiting for your call to schedule the signing of the lease. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please let me know. I'm here to help. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll be in touch soon to finalize the lease signing. It's been a pleasure doing business with you. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment and starting my new life here. Thank you for your assistance and for providing such a wonderful living space.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mister Wang. I'm delighted to hear that you're excited about your new home. I'll be here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Enjoy the rest of your day, and I look forward to seeing you soon to finalize the lease. Thank you once again for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to a smooth lease signing process. Have a wonderful day, and I'll be in touch soon to arrange a meeting. Thank you for your time and for making this process so straightforward.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mister Wang. I'm here to ensure a smooth and straightforward lease signing process. Please let me know when you're ready to meet, and I'll make sure everything is prepared. Enjoy your day, and I look forward to seeing you soon. Thank you for choosing my apartment and for your commitment to being a good tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm ready to meet to sign the lease and provide the security deposit and first month's rent. Could you please let me know the earliest time we can do this? I'm excited to finalize everything and start my new chapter in this wonderful apartment. Thank you for your continued support and assistance.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm thrilled to hear that you're ready to finalize the lease, Mister Wang. I can meet you at the apartment as early as tomorrow morning at 10:00 am. This will give us ample time to go through the lease agreement and complete all the necessary paperwork. Please let me know if this time suits you, and I'll see you then. Thank you for your excitement and commitment to the lease process.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Tomorrow morning at 10:00 am is perfect for me, Mister Schmidt. I'll see you then at the apartment. Thank you for your flexibility and for accommodating my schedule. I'm looking forward to meeting with you and finalizing the lease. Thank you again for everything.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Mister Wang. I'll see you tomorrow at 10:00 am at the apartment. Please bring the security deposit and the first month's rent, along with any identification you may need for the lease signing. I'm looking forward to finalizing our agreement and welcoming you as a tenant. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I hope you have a pleasant evening. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
